<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/clients/{clientId}/sp/sites/{siteId}/lists/{listId}/items/{itemId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This function updates a specific item in a SharePoint list using the provided properties.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"- The `properties` parameter in the `updateOneItem` function is a Record type\nthat contains key-value pairs representing the properties of the list item that you want to\nupdate. The keys are strings representing the property names, and the values can be of any type.\nThese properties will be used to update","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"- The `properties` parameter in the `updateOneItem` function is a Record type\nthat contains key-value pairs representing the properties of the list item that you want to\nupdate. The keys are strings representing the property names, and the values can be of any type.\nThese properties will be used to update","properties":{},"additionalProperties":{},"type":"object","title":"Record_string.any_"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
